welcome_message_body: Welcome to Suzhou, a city known for its classic gardens, serene canals, and rich cultural heritage. We hope you enjoy exploring its charm and discovering all the unique experiences it has to offer.

restaurants.name: 同得兴精品面馆
restaurants.description: 同得兴精品面馆 is a noodle restaurant located in 苏州.
restaurants.address: 沧浪区十全街624号 (凤凰街), 苏州, 江苏

restaurants.name: Yang Yang Dumplings (洋洋饺子馆)

restaurants.name: Bistronomy by Les Tontons
restaurants.description: Bistronomy by Les Tontons is a french restaurant located in 苏州.
